text: Ara granthapraptadera madhye emana loka ache yara kache tumi yadi ekagada amanata rakho se tomake ta phiriye debe, ara tadera madhye emana'o ache yara kache yadi tumi ekati dinara gacchita rakho se tomake ta phiriye debe na, yadi na tumi tara kache damriye thako. E'irupa karana tara bale -- ''aksarajnanahinadera byapare amadera kono patha dhare calara dayitba ne'i.â€™â€™ Ara tara allah sanbandhe mithyaropa kare, yadi'o tara jane.
